rooms.name: Entrance Lobby & Reception
rooms.description: A spacious entrance lobby with reception counter to welcome guests. Designed in Brutalist style featuring raw concrete textures and minimalistic design elements.

rooms.name: Living Room & Kitchenette
rooms.description: A combined living area that merges with a compact kitchenette. Large windows on the east side to invite morning light while preserving Vastu orientation principles, ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment Living Space
rooms.description: The main open-plan living space that doubles as a bedroom and office. The room incorporates robust concrete forms characteristic of Brutalism with exposed structural elements.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dedicated dining space integrated within the living area to maintain connectivity between social spaces. Designed with minimalistic furniture and raw concrete finishes.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Private quarters for domestic helpers, ensuring functionality and privacy while following local building norms and Vastu guidelines to maintain balance in energy flow across the property.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large, solid entrance door with reinforced security features and minimalistic design fitting the Brutalist aesthetic.

openings.name: Windows
openings.description: Multiple strategically placed windows to allow natural light and ventilation. East-facing windows align with Vastu principles for a positive start of day, while north-facing openings ensure balanced energy distribution.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: The master suite featuring a bedroom, walk-in closet, and an attached en-suite bathroom. Emphasis on privacy with solid walls and minimalistic design elements that reflect Brutalism.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom for guests, designed to be comfortable yet functional, complementing the minimalist aesthetic of the overall structure.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Fully equipped bathroom with modern fixtures and finishes. Designed with attention to detail, ensuring a seamless blend with the Brutalist style while being functionally efficient.

openings.name: Balcony
openings.description: A balcony offering views of the landscaped garden. The placement is mindful of Vastu guidelines to harness positive energy and maintain privacy.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: A robust, open staircase connecting the two floors, embodying the raw aesthetics of concrete and steel typical in Brutalist architecture.
